sentences.en: A nuclear holocaust seemed a very real possibility in the '50s.
sentences.cn: 在50年代，核灾难似乎是件很有可能发生的事。

sentences.en: Anne Frank personalized the horrors of the Holocaust in her own words.
sentences.cn: 安.弗兰克用她自己的话使大屠杀的恐怖个人化。

sentences.en: [Above this] many islands will disappear and Africa will suffer a holocaust,” he said.
